name: cyrus_sasl
desc:
The Cyrus SASL package contains a Simple Authentication and 
Security Layer, a method for adding authentication support to 
connection-based protocols. To use SASL, a protocol includes a command 
for identifying and authenticating a user to a server and for optionally
negotiating protection of subsequent protocol interactions. If its use 
is negotiated, a security layer is inserted between the 
protocol and the connection.
